Uses of Package
sx.blah.discord.util

  • Packages that use sx.blah.discord.util 
    Package Description
    sx.blah.discord.api
    This package contains all Discord4J-related apis.
    sx.blah.discord.api.events
    The classes in this package relate to the Discord4J event system.
    sx.blah.discord.api.internal
    This package contains all internal Discord4J apis.
    sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.obj
    This package contains all the implemented versions of Discord objects.
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj
    This contains the interfaces Discord4J users directly interact with.
    sx.blah.discord.util
    This package contains utilities for dealing with the Discord api.
  • Classes in sx.blah.discord.util used by sx.blah.discord.api 
    Class and Description
    DiscordException
    This represents an exception thrown when there is a miscellaneous error doing a discord operation.

    Represents an avatar image.
    RateLimitException
    Represents a 429 TOO MANY REQUESTS return code from a url connection.

    Represents an operation that accepts no input arguments and returns no result.

  • Classes in sx.blah.discord.util used by sx.blah.discord.util 
    Class and Description
    BotInviteBuilder
    This is a utility class to build invite links for server owners to invite your bot.
    DiscordException
    This represents an exception thrown when there is a miscellaneous error doing a discord operation.
    EmbedBuilder
    Builds an EmbedObject for use in sending messages.
    Image
    Represents an avatar image.
    LogMarkers
    This class contains all the SLF4J log Markers used in the Discord4J logger.
    MessageBuilder
    Utility class designed to make message sending easier.
    MessageBuilder.Styles
    Enum describing Markdown formatting that can be used in chat.
    MessageComparator
    This is a comparator built to compare messages based on their timestamps
    MessageList
    This class is a custom implementation of List for retrieving discord messages.
    MessageTokenizer
    A utility class to traverse through a message's contents and step through tokens like mentions, characters, words, etc.
    MessageTokenizer.CustomEmojiToken 
    MessageTokenizer.MentionToken 
    MessageTokenizer.Token
    Represents a part of a message with the content and position.
    MissingPermissionsException
    This exception is thrown when a user is missing the required permissions to perform an action.
    Procedure
    Represents an operation that accepts no input arguments and returns no result.
    RateLimitException
    Represents a 429 TOO MANY REQUESTS return code from a url connection.
    RequestBuffer.IRequest
    This is used to model the request, NOTE: it IS a functional interface so you are encouraged to use lambdas!
    RequestBuffer.IVoidRequest
    This is used to model a request which returns nothing, NOTE: it IS a functional interface so you are encouraged to use lambdas!
    RequestBuffer.RequestFuture
    This represents a future request which may or may not have been executed at the time of construction.
    RequestBuilder
    This is a utility class to help create asynchronous and synchronous interactions with the discord api.
    This builder works on the following model:
    The builder has one "active" action, which is the action currently being modified by these builder methods. When either RequestBuilder.andThen(IRequestAction) or RequestBuilder.elseDo(IRequestAction) are called, the "active" action is then placed on a queue and is replaced by a new action to be modified. After RequestBuilder.execute() is called, the builder then goes down the queue of actions.
    RequestBuilder.IRequestAction
    This represents an action done for a request.
    RoleBuilder
    Utility class designed to make the creation of roles easier.
